Text: EnronOnlines Wireless offeringLouise and Greg Fortune magazines September article about yourvirtually overnightsuccess building EnronOnline prompted me to contact you mostly because our companys Everypath Inc wireless technology could be the perfect tool to help you move the EnronOnline marketplace into wireless by offering trading anytime anywhere via any wireless devices as weve done for ETrade Fidelity and others offering complex wireless transactions Very briefly our company has quickly gained real traction in this space We were honored as a Smithsonian Laureate this year named by Forbes among the Best of the Web in business to business and recognized by CNet as one of ten wireless companies to watch Our partners include Sun Microsystems HewlettPackard Andersen Consulting and Cap Gemini Ernst Young as well as many others and have already raised significant funding from investors such as Robertson Stephens Comdisco Dain Rauscher Wessels Sevin Rosen US Venture Partners Andersen Consulting Ventures Sun and H Q If you see commodities trading moving soon into wireless just as you saw or influenced the industry to move online shouldnt Enron lead the way in wireless trading too We would love the opportunity to talk to you about helping you go wireless Let me know if I should followup with you or someone else in your group by sending an email or calling at any of the numbers below I look forward to hearing from you and to coming home to Houston to speak with you further about this I practiced law in Houston for years with Weil Gotshal Mangesover in the NationsBank building on Louisiana Sincerely David Marcus OLEObj David Marcus Senior Corporate Counsel Everypath Inc North First Street Suite San Jose CA direct cell fax wwweverypathcom OLEObj David Marcus Senior Corporate Counsel Everypath Inc North First Street Suite San Jose CA direct fax
